Instruction: 'Peel the potatoes and grate them using a box grater or food processor.'
'Place the grated potatoes in a clean kitchen towel and squeeze out excess moisture.'
'Transfer the grated potatoes to a bowl and season with salt and black pepper.'
'Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.'
Add the grated potatoes to the skillet, spreading them out evenly.'
Cook the hash browns for about 5-7 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy.'
Once cooked, transfer the hash browns to a plate lined with paper towels to drain any excess oil.'
